body.p: The IASB noted that paragraph 5.4.3 of IFRS 9 refers to the ‘modification or renegotiation of the contractual cash flows’ of a financial asset, while paragraph 3.3.2 of IFRS 9 refers to the ‘modification of the terms’ of an existing financial liability. The IASB noted that although these paragraphs use different words, both refer to a change in the contractual cash flows or contractual terms after the initial recognition of the financial instrument. In both cases, such a change was not specified or considered in the contract at initial recognition.
